item.title: Is Nick Ahmed the best defensive shortstop in baseball
Is Nick Ahmed the best defensive shortstop in baseball?
item.description: Nick Ahmed debuted for the Arizona Diamondbacks in 2014, blossoming into a two time Gold Glove winner and becoming the Diamondbacks everyday shortstop. Let’s see if he is the best defensive shortstop in baseball using shortstop fielding data from the last four seasons. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.1.1 ✓ dplyr 1.0.5 ## ✓ tidyr 1.

item.title: What went wrong for Kentucky basketball this season?
item.description: The bluebloods of college basketball were not their usual selves in the 2020-2021 season, Kentucky being the most disappointing of them all. The Wildcats went 9-16 in the 2020-2021 season and finished 8-9 in conference play, missing the NCAA tournament for the first time since 2013. To begin looking at what went wrong for Kentucky this season, let’s start by grabbing the games logs for each team of the 2020-2021 season.

item.title: R Notebook
item.description: This is an R Markdown Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. Try executing this chunk by clicking the Run button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing Cmd+Shift+Enter. plot(cars) Add a new chunk by clicking the Insert Chunk button on the toolbar or by pressing Cmd+Option+I. When you save the notebook, an HTML file containing the code and output will be saved alongside it (click the Preview button or press Cmd+Shift+K to preview the HTML file).
